title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: A man imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit forms a lasting bond with another inmate and finds a unique way to escape.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who seeks to undermine Gotham's societal structures.

title: Inception
description: A skilled thief uses dream-sharing technology to infiltrate and extract secrets from people's subconscious.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: An intertwining of stories involving two hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits.

title: Forrest Gump
description: A man with a low IQ recounts his extraordinary life, impacting key historical events and finding love.

title: Gladiator
description: A betrayed Roman general fights his way back as a gladiator to seek revenge against the corrupt emperor.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Interstellar
description: A group of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
description: The final battle for Middle-earth begins as Frodo and Sam approach Mount Doom to destroy the One Ring.

title: The Lion King
description: A young lion prince flees his kingdom after the murder of his father, only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

title: The Avengers
description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army.

title: Jurassic Park
description: A theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

title: Titanic
description: A young couple's forbidden love unfolds during the ill-fated maiden voyage of the R.M.S. Titanic.

title: The Social Network
description: The story of how Facebook was founded, and the legal battles that followed its initial success.

title: Avatar
description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
